summary: I wanted to make a more casual Critical Role cosplay were I don’t have to wear a wig, so I decided on cowboy Fjord 🤠 my hexblade...
body: I wanted to make a more casual Critical Role cosplay were I don’t have to wear a wig, so I decided on cowboy Fjord 🤠 my hexblade pistol is shaping up quite nicely. Now I just have to wait two days for the foam clay to completely dry so I can seal and paint this guy

summary: Warp and Weft - Chapter 1 - Beleriandings - Critical Role (Web Series) [Archive of Our Own]
title: Warp and Weft - Chapter 1 - Beleriandings - Critical Role (Web Series) [Archive of Our Own]
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
Chapters: 2/?
Fandom: Critical Role (Web Series)
Rating: General Audiences
Warnings: Major Character Death
Relationships: Molly/Vax if you squint?????, Mollymauk Tealeaf & Vax'ildan, Mollymauk Tealeaf & The Mighty Nein
Characters: Mollymauk Tealeaf, Vax'ildan (Critical Role)
Additional Tags: Vax supervises Molly watching the M9 on TV in the afterlife, Fate Threads, Extended Metaphors, Found Family, Grief/Mourning, Friendship

“Yes, well” said the raven, tying a neat knot on a frayed thread, now connected to two others. “My mother was a seamstress.”
“…Forgive me if I say that that explains absolutely nothing.”
The raven frowned, letting go of the threads and turning to Molly curiously. “You’re a persistent one, aren’t you. You’re free now…” he cocked his head, looking Molly over again. “Shouldn’t you be on your way?”
“…Should I be?”

blog.name: demartinidesigns
blog.title: Art by Danielle DeMartini
blog.description: Illustrator, Graphic Designer, Enthusiastic about Everything. If you like what I do, consider supporting me a ko-fi!

summary: Welcome to the Mighty Nein! The first portrait series is complete! The M9 have made such a huge impact on my life this past year...
caption:
Welcome to the Mighty Nein!

The first portrait series is complete! The M9 have made such a huge impact on my life this past year since I started watching CR and I wanted to capture them with a little bit of softness. I sort of thought of each piece as Jester making a nice drawing while the others weren’t quite paying attention and having a happy little moment.

Thank you to everyone who commissioned me for various portraits at conventions last fall. It really encouraged me to keep going with this series!

I’m even more excited to have them in print with their silver foil accents, exactly how I envisioned them to begin with.

These beauties are available right over here at my store:

danielledemartini.storenvy.com/collections/1775334-critical-role

Seeing as how I’ve also finished the first campaign recently, Vox Machina should be having their turn at portraits soon…

blog.name: bixbiboom
blog.title: I myself am also Enchanter Pumat Sol
blog.description:
Bixbi, older than you.

Fat queer of indeterminate origin.

Possibly a lesser demon.

Hellenist serving Hestia, Hermes and Chiron.

Critical Role has taken over my life and my blog.

Taliesin Jaffe is my boyfriend.

I love you.

#eyesnevershut

summary: I was looking through the IMDB of "Infamous: Second Son" cast a little bit ago because I recognized a few voices but wanted to...
body:
I was looking through the IMDB of “Infamous: Second Son” cast a little bit ago because I recognized a few voices but wanted to be sure they were who I thought they were.

Low and behold, I spoted many names I was familiar with. One of the names being Liam O'Brien. But, my favorite part is not that Liam was in the game. Oh no. My favorite part was that his picture

Was him in his Vax costume.

Look at this dork ass.

blog.name: kimabutch
blog.title: Revolutionary
blog.description: I'm Charlie! I'm attempting to tag "cr spoilers" until the subsequent Tuesday, but don't expect perfection. I'm into a lot of things — right now it's mostly Critical Role, but Utena still owns my heart. 22, butch lesbian, she/her. Link to asks!

summary: Sorry to contributing to your ask spam, but “Gold” by Matt Peake is a perfect Perc’ahlia song
question: Sorry to contributing to your ask spam, but “Gold” by Matt Peake is a perfect Perc’ahlia song
answer:
Bring on the spam! I’m 2 weeks behind, so I’ve just resigned myself that I’ll never finished and I’ll always have a supply of good songs to listen to.

And ooooh, I like:

“This is a declaration/ 
A baring of my soul/ 
Let’s have the conversation/ 
That nobody ever holds” 

For their “anything can happen in the woods” conversation :D

Come yell at me about songs that remind you of Critical Role! (Playlist|song masterlist & spreadsheet by disasterhumans | CR music tag)

summary: there's this one song that just makes me think of the entire show - be the hero from the musical big fish. (ive been meaning to...
question: there's this one song that just makes me think of the entire show - be the hero from the musical big fish. (ive been meaning to make a lyric comic of it for forever but i havent yet so maybe someone else will ghfdgnfdn)
answer:
Ooooh this feels like a DnD-esque song — the idea of writing stories and making powerful worlds…

“What if I told you/ 
You could be a king/ 
Anything you desired, boy/ 
Anything on a plate/ 
All within your power to create”

Come yell at me about songs that remind you of Critical Role! (Playlist|song masterlist & spreadsheet by disasterhumans | CR music tag)
